de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index

Class AbstractRefiningIndex<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.AbstractIndex<O>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.AbstractRefiningIndex<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Index, PageFileStatistics, Result
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PartialVAFile, VAFile

    public abstract class AbstractRefiningIndex<O>
extends AbstractIndex<O>
implements PageFileStatistics
    Abstract base class for Filter-refinement indexes. The number of refinements will be counted as individual page accesses.

    • Nested Class Summary
